welcome.large_window: Please make this window as large as possible.

eventMarker.not_found: Note: no USB event marker found.

instructions.choose_btwn_two_balloons: In this experiment, you will be making a choice between inflating one of 2 balloons by pressing corresponding keys on the keyboard.
instructions.pop_balloon_earn_money:
Once the balloon pops you may win some money.
The money earned from popping a balloon will be shown with a '+' sign in front of it (i.e. +1).
instructions.points_to_bonus_conversion: For every 20 points that you win in the game, you will get $1 bonus at the end of the experiment.
instructions.cumulative_rewards: You will be shown your cumulative total at the end of each trial.
instructions.two_balloons:
There are 2 kinds of balloons:
GREEN and BLUE balloons.
instructions.blue_balloon_points: BLUE balloons will pop after you pump 20 times and may win you 1 point.
instructions.green_balloon_points: GREEN balloons may win you more points, but will require more pumps.
instructions.green_balloon_pop_time: GREEN balloons will always pop after 25 seconds.
instructions.green_balloon_pump_bonus: The more you pump the GREEN balloon after it hits the spike within the 25 seconds time limit, the bigger the balloon will get and you will win more points.
instructions.green_balloon_variable_points_pumps: For the GREEN balloon, the number of pumps needed and the number of points you could win can change on each round.
instructions.blue_balloon_constant_points_pumps:
For the BLUE balloon, the potential win will always stay the same (1 point),
and it always requires 20 pumps.
instructions.reward_prob_variable:
For some rounds, the chances that you will win points are 50%
(even after popping the balloon, and for either balloon).
instructions.reward_prob_certain: In other rounds the chances of winning will be 100% as long as you pop one of the balloons.
instructions.reward_prob_display_event: The chances that you will win on that round, and also the potential amount to win, will be shown to you before you choose which balloon to inflate.
instructions.pump_keys:
Press the q key to pump the balloon on the left.
Press the p key to pump the balloon on the right.
instructions.choice_locked_in: Once you have chosen a balloon, you can only pump that balloon.
instructions.ready:
The experiment will start now.
Press next when ready!
instructions.blue_practice_pump:
In the next trial, try popping the BLUE balloon:
To pump it, press the q key with your left index finger to first choose the blue balloon and to then pump it.
instructions.green_practice_pump:
In the next trial, try popping the GREEN balloon:
To pump it, press the p key with your right index finger to first choose the green balloon and to then pump it.

quiz.respond_correctly: Answer all of the questions below correctly to continue.
quiz.retake: You didn't answer the questions correctly, please retake the quiz.

prompt.green_balloon_high_effort: The green balloon requires more pumps.
prompt.reward_certainty: You will always get the points once you reach the pin.
prompt.green_balloon_bonus: For the green balloon, you can keep pressing once you reach the pin to get bonus points.
prompt.bonus: Your accumulated points will be converted into bonus $.
prompt.rew_feedback: The first number you will be shown after pumping a balloon (for example, +5) is the number of points you just earned for pumping that balloon.
prompt.cumulative_rew: You will be shown the total number of points you have cumulatively earned at the end of each trial.
